data.actual_result: The in: option and your recent searches are missing until you reopen search. Bug is kinda inconsistent, I could reproduce 4/6 times.
data.expected_result: It should display all 4 search options and your recent searches
data.short_description: The in: search filter and recent searches disappear when searching for something, closing and immediately opening search again
data.steps_to_repro: - Search for messages sent by a user (I did from:Dabbit Prime#0896) - Press the back button present on the top left of the screen - Immediately click on the magnifying glass again. This has to be done almost instantly to reproduce the bug
